001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.allure;
002
003import lombok.Getter;
004
005/**
006 * Defines standardized step types for structured Allure reporting.
007 *
008 * <p>This enumeration provides predefined step categories for tracking and organizing Allure steps.
009 * It ensures consistency in test execution logging and enhances readability in reports.
010 *
011 * <p>Each step type has an associated display name used for reporting.
012 *
013 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
014 */
015@Getter
016public enum StepType {
017
018   /**
019    * Represents the overall test execution phase.
020    */
021   TEST_EXECUTION("Test Execution"),
022
023   /**
024    * Represents the teardown phase after test execution.
025    */
026   TEAR_DOWN("Tear Down"),
027
028   /**
029    * Represents the pre-processing phase before executing API requests.
030    */
031   PROCESSING_PRE_QUESTS("Processing Pre-Quests"),
032
033   /**
034    * Represents the authentication process required before executing pre-quest operations.
035    */
036   PERFORMING_PRE_QUEST_AUTHENTICATION("Performing Pre-Quest Authentication"),
037
038   /**
039    * Represents the pre-processing journey for a specific request.
040    */
041   PROCESSING_PRE_QUEST("Processing preQuestJourney");
042
043   /**
044    * The display name of the step type, used in Allure reports.
045    */
046   private final String displayName;
047
048   /**
049    * Constructs a {@code StepType} with the specified display name.
050    *
051    * @param displayName The human-readable name of the step type.
052    */
053   StepType(String displayName) {
054      this.displayName = displayName;
055   }
056
057}
